briefTitle: Clinical Trial Ceftriaxone in Subjects With ALS
officialTitle: Clinical Trial Ceftriaxone in Subjects With Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS)
summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ceftriaxone treatment in amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS).

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From date of randomization until date of death, tracheostomy, or the initiation of permanent assisted ventilation (PAV). This was assessed at time of each participant's drug discontinuation and every 2 months thereafter for the life of the study (6 yrs)
